inclusion.criterion: PCI for first acute MI since 7/1/09 at MMC
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: documented moderate mitral regurgitation on follow up echocardiography six or more weeks after PCI procedure
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: CABG after PCI for acute MI
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of previous MI prior to index MI
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of previous PCI or CABG prior to index PCI
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: EF <30 % on the echocardiogram at 6 weeks after PCI for MI
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but is prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
